message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, my budget is limited and I can only offer $18,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. I could meet you halfway and lower the price to $19,000.  This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Unfortunately, my maximum budget is still $12,000. I am unable to increase my offer.
